name: Chicken VR
description: Chicken VR is a virtual reality first person chicken simulator. You can teleport around and explore, eating food, drinking water, and laying eggs.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
